sentences.en: Impalpable ideas floating through his mind.
sentences.cn: 难以捉摸的念头在头脑中闪现.

sentences.en: The commonplace is just that light , impalpable, aerial essence.
sentences.cn: 平凡才是一种要素,轻盈 、 无形、难以捉摸.

sentences.en: The thirty-two chapters of a novel — if we consider how to read a novel first — are an attempt to make something as formed and controlled as a building: but words are more impalpable than bricks;
sentences.cn: 一部小说——如果我们先考虑一下怎样阅读小说的话——要有32个章节，这道理实际上跟建造有形有状的楼房完全一样：只不文字不像砖块看得见摸得着；

sentences.en: To the untrue man, the whole universe is false- it is impalpable- it shrinks to nothing within his grasp.
sentences.cn: 对那个不真实的人来说，整个宇宙都是虚伪的——都是难以触摸的，在他的把握之中化为子虚乌有。

sentences.en: With the development of breast screening, more cancers are detected in the very early impalpable phase.
sentences.cn: 通过乳房筛查的普及，更多癌症在早期甚至难以被触摸到的时候就被发现。

words.tran_cn: 不能触觉或感知的状态或性质
感触不到的；难理解的；无形的

trans.tran_cn: 难掌握的，难琢磨的，感觉不到的，摸不着的
trans.tran_en: impossible to touch or feel physically
